biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.service.impl
Class ScopeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.service.impl.ScopeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScopeService
public class ScopeServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScopeService

Associations and Occurrence of Topics are only visible within a certain scope. This service manages the scopes. Scopes are not used for security. Each occurrence and association has only one scope (due to otherwise expected performance deterioration). Currently 4 types of Scopes are envisioned: - Organisation - BusinessOpportunity - Universal (not Org. and not BO) - All (see all occurrences, and associations)

Author:
gweich
